articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo defends timing of controversial interview, says it 'won't shake' Portugal team - CNN
articles.description: Portugal captain Cristiano Ronaldo has defended the timing of his interview with Piers Morgan, telling reporters on Monday it "won't shake the changing room's concentration and focus" ahead of the World Cup.
